titles.title: To Know You, To Know You

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
To know You, to know You
Is the cry of my heart.
Holy Spirit, reveal Him in me.
To hear what You're saying
Brings life to my bones,
To know You, to know You alone.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
To serve You, to serve You
Is the cry of my heart.
Holy Spirit, reveal Him in me.
To go where You lead me
Brings life to my bones,
To serve You, to serve You alone.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
To love You, to love You
Is the cry of my heart.
Holy Spirit, reveal Him in me.
To feel Your anointing
Brings life to my bones,
To love You, to love You alone.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
To see You, to see You
Is the cry of my heart.
Holy Spirit, reveal Him in me.
To see Christ in others
Brings life to my bones,
To see You, to see You alone.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
To trust You, to trust You
Is the cry of my heart.
Holy Spirit, reveal Him in me.
To realize You answer
Brings life to my bones,
To trust You, to trust You alone.
